summary: Tomás Kóblic is a former Navy captain who, during the last Argentine dictatorship, was a participant in "the flights of death." He will abandon his career to hide in Colonia Helena, where the only law is a corrupt Commissioner.
cast: Ricardo Darín|Oscar Martínez|Inma Cuesta|Javier Tortarolo|Agustín Bellusci|Alejandro González|Roberto Freire|Fernando Martín|Alejandro Bertero Álvarez|Andrea Campoamor|Andrea Estévez|Camino García|Abian Padrón|Rafael Ayuso|Verónica Tristante Lozano|Carlos Abella|David Mokis|Luis Armesto|Gabriel Fernández|Alejandro Magnone|Marcos Cartoy Díaz|Rafael Fernández Rosendo|Bernardo Forteza|Norberto Muñoz|Ariel Gigena|Santiago Fraccaroli|Marcelo D'Andrea|Miriam Odorico|Gustavo Masó|Fabricio Villagra|Rafael Montañez|Omar Fanucci|Maxi Farber|Bonilla Del Valle|Florencia Salas|Héctor Guilligan|Víctor William Giménez|Alicia Juncal|Alejandro Lucena|Ricardo Lazara|Héctor La Porta|Ariel Chavarría
keywords: killing a dog|character name as title|operation condor|violence|military
title: Capitán Kóblic
